name: German Renewable Energy Federation
goal: The German Renewable Energy Federation (BEE) is an umbrella organization that represents the interests of 41 associations and companies, with 30,000 individual members, including 5,000 companies. Our members include the German Wind Energy Association (Bundesverband WindEnergie), the German Solar Association (Bundesverband Solarwirtschaft), German Biogas Association (Fachverband Biogas) and the Federal Association of German Hydroelectric Power Plants (Bundesverband Deutscher Wasserkraftwerke). We represent 355,400 workplaces and more than 3 million power plant operators. Our goal is 100 per cent renewable energy within the electricity, heating and transport sectors.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
